short_summary: Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS) for the services of: One Core (1) and One Non-Core (1) Engineering Graduate, Intermediate
description: The requirement is for One (1) Core and One (1) Non-Core Intermediate Engineering Graduate. The resource will provide project Engineering services and assist the CH146 Project and Obsolescence Manager with activities related to Engineering project functions.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
New  procurement Approch applied by Canada for intergovernmental trades (CETA agreement)
